text: @daveks88 It doesn’t wind scousers up, it Just’s just funny when people from Burnley etc sing it to them. I almost pity rival fans who sing it. So to that end, I honestly believe that it’s just sung because they hear it at Anfield and Dortmund and Celtic etc, and vicariously want in.
